testcase.name: Generic link loc DTS discovery static analysis
testcase.description: Test DTS discovery of loc elements in a generic link.

variation.name: A link:loc in a generic link does cause DTS discovery.
variation.description: The discovered taxonomy has a deliberate xbrl error to cause result invalidity if discovery is effective (which it should be).

variation.name: A non-link loc in a generic link doesn't cause DTS discovery.
variation.description: The discovered taxonomy, which has a deliberate xbrl error to cause result invalidity, should not be discovered because the loc is derived from link:loc, but not actually link:loc.
